posts.postText:
I don't know if this is the first place to report but I got another chat request from someone claiming NNJG

iinMoRtAl dEliiReOuM: http://StoreSteam.tk

Clicking on the link sent to web browsers phishing detector being set off. Second one recently, I guess we are getting popular :).
He was hacked, it's not their faults man.

>> Bob Dole":aon69kql]
He was hacked, it's not their faults man.
 


He still needs to be removed until account gotten back

If he was hacked, and is kicked from the group, he will probably just re-join it and spam the link again. just wait for him to get his account back.
